author: Fred Kempe
title: Op-Ed: Coronavirus will hit emerging markets with devastating force
description: In short, developing countries – even as they act to save themselves – must shift far greater attention to fragile states and emerging markets, where the hit from the virus is likely to be far more devastating, destabilizing, and enduring, writes Fred Kempe.
content:
With apologies to the great hockey player Wayne Gretzky, the world should follow the (paraphrased) advice given to him by his father in tackling the global pandemic of COVID-19: "Skate to where the pathogen is going, and not to where it has been."
In short, … [+7249 chars]
